name: Finding fairies
storyline:
Can you find all the fairies? Help Jacqueline search fairies and survive from the dark basement!
Darkness of the basement blocks out where the monsters are. Small light from Jacqueline shows you where you can go. And your memory will help you avoid monsters and find the fairies, the goal of the stage.
summary: Finding Fairies' is a turn-based pathfinding puzzle game based on light and darkness mechanism.
